programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Desperate to see Emily, Ah Hock drops a bombshell on Charles. Zaryf finally comes clean about his dependence on the smart drugs. Meanwhile, Celia gets a surprise visitor, or two.

programme.title: 72 Cutest Animals
programme.desc: Visually stunning and packed with scientific facts, this is a countdown and investigation into the cutest animals in the world. Animal lovers and experts assess each creature and rank them on a sliding scale to eventually uncover the cutest one in the world.

programme.title: Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: A Japanese sports entertainment television series in which 100 competitors attempt to complete an obstacle course.

programme.title: The Noise S1
programme.desc: To succeed in THE NOISE, teams of contestants must complete seemingly easy challenges without making a single sound. Can they pedal a bicycle or unzip a sports bag or open a can of coke while staying completely quiet?

programme.title: The Strangest Weather On Earth S3
programme.desc: Season 3 of the series explores the wild and wonderful world of the weirdest weather on earth with each episode featuring spectacular visuals, fascinating demonstrations and explanations as to what causes all of these strange occurrences.

programme.title: Mata Mata S3
programme.desc: Patricia and Han Lim, with their common interest in local cuisine, start to have more meals together, and are spotted by the other CID officers, who start to gossip. The team investigates a possible hostage situation in a wealthy neighbourhood.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's UK
programme.desc: With his heritage never too far away, coupled with his passion for food, Luke unearths the multicultural diversity that has changed the tastebuds in the United Kingdom. Luke embarks on a culinary exploration around the UK unearthing the unique, the quirky and mouth-watering food delicacies of this historic and fascinating island. He travels through England to Wales, Scotland and then back to London where he meets wonderful characters along the way.

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Coastal Kitchen S2
programme.desc: After bidding farewell to city life and moving to the Sunshine coast with his family, Chef and Restaurateur Peter Kuruvita is on a journey to uncover the region's best food producers and create seasonal dishes in his coastal kitchen.

programme.title: Masterchef Junior USA S6
programme.desc: MasterChef Junior is an American cooking competition involving children from the ages of 8 to 13. The sixth season returns with chefs Gordon Ramsay and Christina Tosi acting as the judges, along Joe Bastianich as the third judge.

programme.title: Magic Adventures: The Crystal of Dark
programme.desc: A young princess Olivia is transported to many wondrous lands and along the way she teams up with allies. Together they embark on a dangerous quest to find 4 great wizards and 7 magic crystals that will help her stop the Dark wizard and save her parents, and they learn that real magic is having good virtues of courage, friendship, and cooperation.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force follows the thrilling, fast-paced exploits of five mighty animal heroes as they serve and protect the citizens of five unique animal kingdoms. Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech. Whatever the problem, big or small, these heroes come together to work as one - Kingdom Force Unite!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: The children and Mr. Dragon create one big, exciting story together. Each child adds their own creativity and imagination to the made-up tale. programme.desc: Having "fixed" what went wrong in 1965, Alan returns to present day, expecting to get his old life back. To his horror, he's still daddy to 3 kids and worse still, finds out that he managed to mess up everyone's lives even more than before. Alan needs to go back to 1965 again, but he has run out of time-travel ink. He searches desperately for help, and meets someone unexpected.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S2

programme.title: Heroes & Survivors : Defying Death S2

At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.desc: Hiccup is sneezing out of the blue and no one knows why. Sneeze and Bibi wonder if, like Sneeze, she's sneezing because she's scared, or perhaps she's just feeling unwell. They try different things to get to the bottom of this mystery.

Professor Hoot can't seem to get the Hootlets to settle down for a nap. Meanwhile, Hazel can't seem to stay awake long enough to make her delivery. What's in the Package that can help Professor Hoot get the Hootlets their much needed rest...and help Hazel along the way?

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S4

Sky asks Citu to get the little buses to help Trammy get used to her work.

Will she succeed or can she count on her friends when she needs them the most?

programme.title: 早餐中国 II
programme.desc: 安徽池州小粑，池州市民平日必备的早餐之一。脆脆的外壳，丰富的馅料；萝卜馅鲜甜多汁，粉丝馅香辣柔韧，肉馅鲜香迷人，豆角脆爽可口，腌菜咸淡适中，真是好看又好吃。豆腐脑该吃甜的还是咸的，这个我们先不争，我们来研究一下，豆腐脑里居然有牛肉！细嫩爽滑之豆花与粉条，用豆粉加水勾汁，炖牛肉之厚重，搭配小笼粉蒸牛肉，或肥肠或咔饼，这个早餐完美了。皮松软，肉汁香，焦黄的脆底赞。老面发酵是杭州老底子煎包的灵魂，老面发的皮才香，一条老面发一盆面，皮要擀薄，提高口感，用的都是精选的猪后腿肉手工剁碎，煎到底部呈现金黄焦脆，撒上葱花.

programme.title: 早餐中国 II
programme.desc: (重) 安徽池州小粑，池州市民平日必备的早餐之一。脆脆的外壳，丰富的馅料；萝卜馅鲜甜多汁，粉丝馅香辣柔韧，肉馅鲜香迷人，豆角脆爽可口，腌菜咸淡适中，真是好看又好吃。豆腐脑该吃甜的还是咸的，这个我们先不争，我们来研究一下，豆腐脑里居然有牛肉！细嫩爽滑之豆花与粉条，用豆粉加水勾汁，炖牛肉之厚重，搭配小笼粉蒸牛肉，或肥肠或咔饼，这个早餐完美了。皮松软，肉汁香，焦黄的脆底赞。老面发酵是杭州老底子煎包的灵魂，老面发的皮才香，一条老面发一盆面，皮要擀薄，提高口感，用的都是精选的猪后腿肉手工剁碎，煎到底部呈现金黄焦脆，.

programme.title: 分界线
programme.desc: (重) 世界海拔最高的通航湖泊的的喀喀湖中，古老的乌鲁斯族人在自建的浮岛上生活繁衍了数百年。虽然几代人都过着与世隔绝的渔民生活，近几十年来岛民为了脱离贫困却不得不开放门户接待大量涌入的游客。大部分的乌鲁斯人也已经离开了浮岛，融入秘鲁的现代生活当中。与时并进或是保留传统，这些“湖泊的子民”该如何选择？.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人

programme.desc: (PG) 姿颖和思雅目睹并打断了整个告白，思雅受伤地离开现场。思雅和芸汐对质，变成三姐妹互掀疮疤，不欢而散，思雅也搬离了原本的房间。到了原本约定好的台湾之旅之日，三姐妹再一同来这家火锅店，显然还是在乎对方。2020年，就在思雅回顾着当年的台湾之旅之时，她居然收到了Romeo的短信。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 海珠得知玛亚是如莉的女儿，非常崩溃，她不能相信自己爱了那么久的女儿竟然是如莉的，智媛跟她说嘉亚很有可能得跟海成一样的病，所以领养着玛亚，有可能会是将来挽救嘉亚的人，海珠内心痛苦，却只能忍着。.

programme.title: 巨力莱拉
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/泰) 随着巨人世界女王的妹妹滨图曼造反，女王滨图若命令查理带着莱拉公主到人类的世界躲避滨图曼的追杀。.

programme.title: 坏爱情
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 浩镇进路维集团工作，准备去公司上班前，特地要母亲对华兰保密，别让华兰知道浩镇的身分。.

programme.title: 坏爱情
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 素媛无意间得知在赫去见相亲对象才没去他们约好的地方。素媛伤心回家，忍不住对追回家找她的在赫告白。.

programme.title: 稀游记之你还好吗？
programme.desc: (PG)(首播) 朱佩嘉是我国第一位首次闯入奥运会的马术运动员。六岁就开始骑马的她，10年前来到英国这个马术之国就开始了不懈的训练。马术以外，她也是一名专业律师。在英国郊外的马厩，主持人欧菁仙发相人与马之间的微妙关系。.

programme.title: 谎言的谎言
